txt.en: 'I am not an historian by any means, but my conclusion is the same as yours - these are indeed very old. I will make arrangements for these to be transported to Minas Tirith, if and when the opportunity should arise.'
Collect Gondorian artifacts in The Towers of the Teeth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You find some Gondorian artifacts buried in the rubble of the lower levels within the Towers of the Teeth.
The Towers of the Teeth are located in the Slag-hills.\n\nYou should collect Gondorian artifacts scattered around the towers.
You come across an old Gondorian artifact buried in the rubble. It looks to be an item left over from when these towers were last occupied by Men, and worth preserving.
Thurindol can be found at a small Ranger outpost hidden in the Slag-hills.\n\nYou should bring the artifacts you collected to Thurindol.
